snippet.title: 10 Lines Hero - MSX Homebrew
snippet.description:
Developed for the BASIC 10Liner 2021 contest, the objective of the game is to rescue the princess who has been kidnapped by monsters. You have to defeat the monsters that live in the dungeon and reach the room where the princess is trapped.

itch.io link: https://bunsen.itch.io/10-lines-hero-by-honoppe
NOTE: If you are playing on RetroArch (either fMSX or blueMSX cores), please use the updated 1.10 version, as the original file has a glitch when played on those cores.

#basic10liner #basictenliner #tenlines #tenliner #msx #msx2 #msxhomebrew #msx2homebrew #10lineshero #homebrew #homebrewgames #rpg #roleplayinggame #honoppe
